title: tso typeface
content:
I was wondering if someone could identify the typeface used on the tso website and promotional material? Specifically the typeface used to write “tso” “Toronto Symphony Orchestra” at the top. It would be a huge help!

[http://www.tso.on.ca/season/index.cfm](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907161041/http:/www.tso.on.ca/season/index.cfm "http://www.tso.on.ca/season/index.cfm")

 [‹ armani font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907161041/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42256 "Go to previous forum topic") [bebel gilberto's latest ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907161041/http:/www.typophile.com/node/42296 "Go to next forum topic")
author: csping
